replies.body: They do get annoying, but how come we should only congratulate "popular" players. I mean, just because we haven't seen him much doesn't mean he is random. He must play often if he got prestige.

replies.body:
I think these type of threads are fine for 1st and 5th prestige.

But when you make them for EVERY one of your prestiges it gets rather obnoxious.
